name: lerna-monorepo-mr2
description: Management release example for Lerna monorepos.

scripts.publish-packages-dev: lerna version -m 'chore(release): tag changed package releases on dev' --conventional-commits --conventional-prerelease='*' --preid dev --yes
scripts.publish-packages-prod: lerna version -m 'chore(release): tag changed package releases on prod' --conventional-commits --conventional-graduate='*' --yes
